Question.Subject: Is webstarts.com a safe website?
Question.Content: I want to make my own website, and thought about using webtarts.com. First, is it safe? They won't steal my personal information will they? And can i make my own url? It won't have any add-ons will it? For instance: example.webstarts.com I DON'T WANT THAT!!! All i want would be example.com Can i do that on webstarts.com? If not, can someone tell me a free site that i can? Neil Will I have my own URL if i use that site?
Question.ChosenAnswer: if you want to make your own website then freewebs.com is better.

Answer.Content: if you want to make your own website then freewebs.com is better.
